categories: Category:New Republic Defense Force enlisted personnel

nodes.text: Ragnell was a female sergeant who served as an engineer and mechanic aboard the New Republic's Lodestar. At one point, Imperial defector Yrica Quell asked Ragnell to paint her new squadron's starfighters with the Alphabet Squadron insignia.

Ragnell was heavily tattooed with colorful whorls, dancing figures, and other elaborate pictograms. Sometimes, she would work in the hangar at night, noting to General Hera Syndulla that her body was still stuck on Chandrilan time.
